pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adjusting for Optimism in 'glmnet' Regression using Bootstrapping // Main objective of a predictive model is to provide accurated predictions of a new observations. Unfortunately we don't know how well the model performs. In addition, at the current era of omic data where p n, is not reasonable applying internal validation using data-splitting. Under this background a good method to assessing model performance is applying internal bootstrap validation (Harrell Jr, Frank E (2015) doi:10.1007/978-1-4757-3462-1.) This package provides bootstrap validation for the linear and logistic 'glmnet' models.
